Makes summary plots of editing

Source: R/differential_expression.R
make_editing_plots.Rd

Generates plots of the number of sites edited per sample and the percent of editing events per sample. This function is written to be called directly by add_editing_frequencies

Usage

make_editing_plots(
  se_object,
  colors = NULL,
  meta_col = "genotype_treatment",
  replicate = "rep"
)

Arguments

se_object

A SummarizedExperiment object created by create_se

colors

OPTIONAL The colors of the replicates. If no colors are provided, Set1 from `RColorBrewer will be used

meta_col

The column in colData to be used to separate out samples based on the condition. For example, "genotype", "treatment", or "genotype_treatment." Default is "genotype_treatment."

replicate

The column in colData contining information about the replicates. Default is "rep".
